    TimeToLive.TTL — Type.
    TTL(ttl::Period; refresh_on_access::Bool=true) -> TTL{Any, Any}
TTL{K, V}(ttl::Period; refresh_on_access::Bool=true) -> TTL{K, V}

    A TTL cache. If refresh_on_access is set, expiries are reset whenever they are accessed.
